description:
Monkeying around with Python at New Relic

Presented by Graham Dumpleton

This session will cover the challenges of creating a production
application performance monitoring system for Python. It includes an
overview of the architecture of the system, as well as how it hooks into
Django and captures details about web transactions, database
transactions, memcache requests, exceptions and much more.
title: Monkeying Around with Python at New Relic
